content:
1843 , The Economist ’s bi-monthly sister magazine, is looking for a senior editor to work full time in our London office. This is an exciting opportunity to work at The Economist and be part of a team responsible for narrative journalism online and in print.

We are looking for a dedicated journalist and rigorous, experienced editor to commission and edit long-form features, profiles and The 1843 Interview. You will also shape ideas and cultivate new writers for oTher features for print and online. You will have great contacts, experience of wrangling writers and Interviewees and fantastic ideas, as well as a good visual sense and interest in design. The successful applicant will work with a highly professional team, and will be expected to have an interest in, and ideas for, all parts of The publication.

To apply, please send a cover letter, CV, three ideas for features and a critique of the magazine to 1843features@economist.com by August 6th.

The Economist Group values diversity. We are committed to equal opportunities and creating an inclusive environment for all our employees. We welcome applicants regardless of ethnic origin, national origin, gender, race, colour, religious beliefs, disability, sexual orientation or age.

ex: n. 八月
网络 威严的；奥古斯特；八月份
eg2: August Bank Holiday(= a public holiday on the last Monday in August in Britain)
八月银行假日（英国公共假日，八月最后一个星期一）

ex: n. 经济学家，经济专家
n. 组；集团；群；类
v. 成组；将…分类；把…分组
网络 群组；团体；小组
eg2: a group of girls/trees/houses
一群姑娘；一片树林；一排房子
A group of us is/are going to the theatre this evening.
我们有一帮人今晚要去看戏。
Students stood around in groups waiting for their results.
学生们成群地站在周围等待成绩。
The residents formed a community action group.
居民组成了社区行动组。
English is a member of the Germanic group of languages
英语是日耳曼语族中的一种语言。
The proportion of single parent families varies between different income groups.
单亲家庭比例在不同收入群中各不相同。
a minority group
少数群体
ethnic groups
族群
a group activity(= done by a number of people working together)
小组活动
She asked her students to get into groups of four.
她让学生每四人分为一小组。
to work in groups
分组工作
a newspaper group
报业集团
the Burton group
伯顿集团
the group sales director
集团销售董事
She sings in a rock group.
她是摇滚乐队的歌手。
The children grouped themselves around their teacher.
孩子们聚集在老师周围。
We all grouped around the tree for a photograph.
我们全体围着这棵树照了张相。
The colleges grouped together to offer a wider range of courses.
这些学院联合在一起，以开设范围更广的课程。
The books are grouped together by subject.
这些书按科目分类。
Contestants were grouped according to age and ability.
参赛者按年龄和能力分组。

ex: n. 面试；访谈；面谈；会谈
v. 面谈；访问；对（某人）进行面试（或面谈）；接受面试
网络 采访；会见；接见
eg2: a job interview
求职面试
to be called for (an) interview
获通知约见
He has an interview next week for the manager's job.
他下周要接受一个经理职位的面试。
a television/radio/newspaper interview
电视╱电台╱报纸采访
an interview with the new Governor
对新任州长的采访
to give an interview(= to agree to answer questions)
接受采访
Yesterday, in an interview on German television, the minister denied the reports.
昨天，在德国电视台的采访中，部长否认了那些报道。
to conduct an interview(= to ask sb questions in public)
进行采访
The interview was published in all the papers.
各家报纸都刊载了这次访谈。
an interview with the careers adviser
和择业顾问的面谈
Which post are you being interviewed for?
你参加哪个职位的面试？
We interviewed ten people for the job.
我们为这份工作面试了十人。
The website gives you tips on interviewing for colleges.
这个网站为你提供大学面试的窍门。
If you don't interview well you are unlikely to get the job.
如果面试时表现不好，你很可能不会得到这份工作。
Next week, I will be interviewing Spielberg about his latest movie.
下周我将访问斯皮尔伯格，谈论他的最新电影。
The Prime Minister declined to be interviewed.
首相婉拒了采访。
The police are waiting to interview the injured man.
警察正等待着向受伤的男子问话。

ex: adj. 大；级别（或地位）高的；成人的；高级水平的

我有十年的高层管理经验。
Junior nurses usually work alongside more senior nurses.
初级护士通常和较高级的护士一起工作。
He is senior to me.
他的职位比我高。
The meeting should be chaired by the most senior person present.
会议应由在座的职位最高的人主持。
to take part in senior competitions
参加成人比赛
He won the senior men's 400 metres.
他获得男子甲组 400 米冠军。

持有老年火车通行优惠卡可减免三分之一车费。
senior discounts/concessions
老年折扣／优惠
the senior prom
毕业年级舞会
She was ten years his senior.
她比他大十岁。
My brother is my senior by two years.
我哥哥比我大两岁。
She felt unappreciated both by her colleagues and her seniors.
她觉得无论同事还是上司都不赏识她。
tennis coaching for juniors and seniors
初、高级网球训练
high school seniors
高中毕业班学生

ex: n. 申请人，申请者；请求者
eg2: This applicant is by far the better than that one.
这个申请者远比那一个好。
But the college has seen more than one male  “sit back on the couch, sometimes with their eyes closed, while their mom tells them where to go and what to do.
但是，在大学里不止会看到一两个男性申请人“靠在椅子上，有时候还闭着眼，悠闲自得。 有时候还要他妈妈告诉他该去哪，该做什么。
One such questionnaire shall be presented to each .
每位申请人均将得到这样一份问卷。

wp.Positive Critique: 建设性批判;建设性批评;性批判

ex: n. 批评；评论文章
vt. 批判；评论
eg2: This is an essential part of the  of structuralism.
这是结构主义评论的必不可少的一部分。
Which is true, to a certain extent.But the problem with the no limit perspective is that it avoids criticism because every critique is labeled as a “limitation.
在一定程度上，这是正确的，但不存在限制这一观点引发的问题是，它避免了批评，因为每个批判都是黏上“限制”标签的。
I am keeping my , because the site did feature the bad design for more than a year — and in any case you can still learn from their mistake, even after they [partly] fixed it.
我还是保留我的批评，因为这个愚蠢的设计他们用了长达一年之久 --- 无论如何就算在他们对它进行了“部分的”修改之后，你仍能从他们的错误中学到东西。

ex: vt. 培养；陶冶；耕作
eg2: Because I want to cultivate the relationship with myself.
因为我想培养和自己的关系。
We must cultivate compassion for ourselves and for others for our survival.
我们必须为了他人，自己及我们的生存去培养善良。
But how do we cultivate positive emotions?
但是我们该如何培养积极的情感呢？

wp.Dedicate Server: 独享服务器;专用服务器

ex: vt. 致力；献身；题献
eg2: She vowed to herself that she would  her life to scientific studies.
她默默地发誓要献身于科学研究。
They take ownership of compatibility issues we raise and  effort to seeing them through.
他们具有我们所说的兼容性问题，并且正致力于解决这些问题。
As young people search for meaning in their lives, their minds are often open to all possible choices about what to believe, how to live, and what—if anything—to  themselves to.
当年轻人探索他们的生命意义时，他们的心灵往往向一切可能的选择敞开，像是关于信仰什么，如何生活，以及——如果一定要这样说的话——为了什么而献身。

这样，他们对于这多样性存在的线索知道很少。
A world of peace and solidarity can only be accomplished by acknowledging and celebrating our .
只有承认和颂扬我们的多样性，才能实现一个和平与团结的世界。
They help us grasp the diversity of life on the planet.
这些标本有助于我们把握地球生命的多样性。

n. 古怪的人
eg2: That's . He's vanished in the twinkling of an eye.
他怎么一转眼就不见了， 真见鬼。
I mean one of the fantastic things about America is that that is in fact possible.
我是指美国不可思议的事情之一就是事实上这种想法是有可能实现的。
We don't have that, but we have a fantastic community of people who live near us and we have to look after them so they come back time and time again.
而我们没有这种条件，但我们有不可思议的一社区的人们住在我们附近，我们必须关心他们，他们才能一次又一次地回来光顾我们。

ex: adj. 包括的，包含的
eg2: This process should be  of all departments and all situations.
此过程应该包括所有部门和所有的情况。
As a convenience, I use the term "mechanism," as in the phrase "governance mechanism" to be all- of the components identified above.
为了方便起见，如在短语“治理机制”中一样，我使用术语“机制”来包括上面所识别的所有组成部分。
Obviously, if "ashtray" or "painting" belongs in home furnishings, then it certainly belongs in the bigger, more  combined category too.
显然，如果“烟灰缸”或“油画”属于家居用品，那么它们当然属于一个大的包含更多的分类中。

第二，一群人的故事：我们是谁？

她想把这个故事改编成小说。
Our ordinary life, at least in its narrative quality, provides no direct analog for the programming constructs of these languages.
我们的日常生活（至少在叙事质量方面）没有提供对这些语言的编程构造的直接模拟。

我应该怎样选择曲线的方向呢？
The winding trail caused us to lose our .
迂回曲折的小道使我们迷失了方向。
We need to avoid these spurious 0,0 readings, as about one out of every 10 readings at any  of the sensor will be 0,0 -- invalid data, indeed.
需要避免这些虚假的 0,0 读数，来自传感器各个方向上的每 10 个读数中就会有一个读数是 0,0 —— 无效的数据，确实如此。

ex: n. 部分（等于a part）
n. (Pars)人名；(土、瑞典)帕尔斯
eg2: South , the world's largest reservoir of gas, is shared by Iran and Qatar. The Iranian part is divided into 24 phases.
South 是全球最大的天然气田,由伊朗与卡塔尔共同拥有.伊朗拥有的部分被划分为24期.
"If interested, Total can continue negotiations for the downstream sector of this phase and the pars LNG project," he said.
他说,"如果道达尔有兴趣,可以继续参与第11期下游部分的谈判,参加到 LNG项目中来."
"If the current trend of the development of South pars phase 11 continues, it is also possible that the whole contract be ceded to powerful domestic contractors," Qalebani said.
"如果South 气田第11期项目的开发维持目前态势,有可能会把整个项目转让给实力雄厚的国内承包商,"Qalebani并称.

ex: n. 侧面；轮廓；外形；剖面；简况
vt. 描…的轮廓；扼要描述

eg2: I like to profile people in what they are doing and how they can help others.
我喜欢以人们正在做的事儿和他们帮助别人的方式来描述他人。
You can then export this profile so that other users can simply import the .
您可以输出这个轮廓，这样其他用户仅仅只需要输入这个轮廓即可。
class and enumerations are not supported in this release; therefore, they do not show up in the wizard.
配置文件类和列举在这个释放中是不被支持的；因此，它们不会显示在这个向导中。

ex: adj. 严格的，严厉的；严密的；严酷的

wp.Rigorous study: 严谨的学风;严密的研究

eg2: Our teacher is so  that he seldom lets up on us.
我们的老师很严格，他很少放松对我们的要求。
Migration is just a part of that lifecycle process, and therefore should involve rigorous testing at each stage of the project.
迁移仅仅只是生命周期过程中的一部分，因此严格的测试应该包括在项目的各个阶段当中。
The focus was on learning how to think critically, do research, communicate and improve writing skills, all in preparation for a rigorous high school curriculum.
注意力在于学习如何批判性地思考，做调查研究，沟通和提高写作技巧，所有都是为严密的高校课程做准备。

ex: n. 争论；吵嘴
vi. 争论；争吵
vt. 争论；争吵；辩驳
n. (Wrangle)人名；(瑞典)弗朗勒
eg2: Don't wrangle with others over trifles.
别为一些琐事与别人争吵。
And China keeps giving reminders of its unresolved wrangle with India over what is now the Indian state of Arunachal Pradesh, which it briefly overran in 1962.
中国反复提出与印度的边界纠纷，该争论尚未解决，1962年中国曾短暂占领过阿鲁纳恰邦，现在该地区属于印度。
China's Premier Wen Jiabao has warned against interference by "external forces" in the maritime , over a strategic and resource-rich area where several regional nations have overlapping claims.
中国总理温家宝警告那些参与海上争论的“国外势力”不要介入南中国海问题，南海作为一块战略要地和资源丰富地区使得很多国家宣布对其有领土权。

Title: Senior editor, 1843 (London)
